name: babbity baby hat
notes:
i love this little hat - and i hope you do too!

it's very easy to knit - but pretty and practical too.  

*you all love my 'babbity baby jacket'! 
 and lots of you have been asking for a matching hat ......
so here it is!* 

dk (8ply) yarn

4mm needles

this cute little hat is perfect for boys or girls and only requires 18 - 20g of yarn! 

perfect for charity donation ~ or ~ a pretty gift for a baby shower


**to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below
